channel.title: Connectting Problem
channel.description:
Hi, Well I haven't played moparscape in FOREVER, and I might have forgotten some stuff. I was trying to get my server running, and it worked. It let me get on, but when I tried to get on with the ip it didn't work. These are the steps I did:
1) Go to No-Ip.com. 2) Make a host. 3) Updae it on No-Ip DUC. 4) Went to Firewall. 5) Added the port at Firewall\Exceptions. 6) Compiled server. 7) Run server.
After all that is still doesn't work. Can anyone help me?

item.title: Connectting Problem
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

Hi,
Well I haven’t played moparscape in FOREVER, and I might have forgotten some stuff. I was trying to get my server running, and it worked. It let me get on, but when I tried to get on with the ip it didn’t work. These are the steps I did:

  1. Go to No-Ip.com.
  2. Make a host.
  3. Updae it on No-Ip DUC.
  4. Went to Firewall.
  5. Added the port at Firewall\Exceptions.
  6. Compiled server.
  7. Run server.

After all that is still doesn’t work. Can anyone help me?

Read full topic
